paper_abstract: We introduce a new class of multiplicative proof nets, J-proof nets, which are a typed version of Faggian and Maurel's multiplicative L-nets. In J-proof nets, we can characterize nets with different degrees of sequentiality, by gradual insertion of sequentiality constraints. As a byproduct, we obtain a simple proof of the sequentialisation theorem.
paper_title: Jump from parallel to sequential proofs: Multiplicatives
